headline.print_headline: Studies Back Guidelines for Wider Use of Statins
headline.main: 2 Studies Back Guidelines for Wider Use of Statins

docs.abstract: Two studies published in journal of American Medical Assn back controversial new guidelines that call for wider use of cholesterol-lowering statins; debate continues over greater cholesterol care to bring down heart attack risks.

keywords.value: Journal of the American Medical Assn
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: The studies lend support to controversial new guidelines that could vastly increase the number of Americans advised to take cholesterol-lowering drugs.
docs.snippet: The studies lend support to controversial new guidelines that could vastly increase the number of Americans advised to take cholesterol-lowering drugs.
